### Summary

### Details
(TO REMOVE) - May be skipped if you don't know what should be here
- **Core Logic:** [Describe the main functionality to be implemented.]
- **Integration:** [Specify how this should interact with existing systems or APIs.]
- **Data Handling:** [Mention data formats, storage requirements, or specific context like timestamps.]

### Benefits
- **Efficiency:** [How does this improve the workflow or system performance?]
- **Reliability:** [How does this help with troubleshooting or data persistence?]
- **User Experience:** [What is the direct impact on the end-user or developer?]

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] **Functionality:** The feature works as described across all specified environments.
- [ ] **Formatting:** Output/data follows the defined structure (e.g., JSON, ISO timestamps).
- [ ] **Stability:** Edge cases (e.g., full storage, network loss) are handled gracefully.
